scripts.test:windows: npm run build-fe && npm run build-tests && playwright test --project=chrome --project=firefox --project=edge -c ./tests-out
scripts.test:macos: npm run build-fe && npm run build-tests && playwright test --project=chrome --project=firefox --project=webkit -c ./tests-out
scripts.test:linux: npm run build-fe && npm run build-tests && playwright test --project=chrome --project=firefox -c ./tests-out
scripts.install-browsers:windows: playwright install --with-deps chrome & playwright install --with-deps firefox & playwright install --with-deps msedge & playwright install ffmpeg
scripts.install-browsers:macos: playwright install --with-deps chrome; playwright install --with-deps firefox; playwright install --with-deps webkit; playwright install ffmpeg
scripts.install-browsers:linux: playwright install --with-deps chrome; playwright install --with-deps firefox; playwright install ffmpeg
scripts.test:debug: npm run build-fe && npm run build-tests && playwright test --debug --project=chrome -c ./tests-out
scripts.test:strict: npm run build-fe && npm run build-tests && playwright test --project=chrome -c ./tests-out --retries=0 --trace=on
scripts.test:watch: concurrently --kill-others "rimraf ./tests-out && tsc -w" "cross-env PWTEST_WATCH=1 npm run test"
